statements: DELETE FROM predictive_maintenance_models WHERE maintenance_required = TRUE
DELETE FROM predictive_maintenance_models WHERE equipment_id = 101 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM predictive_maintenance_models WHERE maintenance_required = TRUE;
DELETE FROM predictive_maintenance WHERE equipment_id = 101 AND maintenance_type = 'Routine';
DELETE FROM equipment_energy_usage WHERE energy_consumed > 500 AND usage_end < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM energy_consumption WHERE equipment_id = 101 AND energy_usage > 500;
DELETE FROM energy_consumption WHERE equipment_id = 5 AND energy_usage > 100
DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE equipment_id = 2001 AND sensor_type = 'Temperature';
DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE reading > 100 AND sensor_type = 'temperature';
